Bash(sshpass -p 'Boomershub@123' ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@5.161.183.69 "docker exec suitecrm bash -c ''
for mod in TwilioIntegration LeadJourney FunnelDashboard SalesTargets Packages NotificationHub VerbacallIntegration; do
  if [ -d /opt/bitnami/suitecrm/modules/$mod ]; then
    rm -rf /bitnami/suitecrm/public/legacy/modules/$mod
    cp -r /opt/bitnami/suitecrm/modules/$mod /bitnami/suitecrm/public/legacy/modules/
    chown -R daemon:daemon /bitnami/suitecrm/public/legacy/modules/$mod
    echo ""Synced: $mod""
  fi
done
rm -rf /bitnami/suitecrm/cache/*
rm -rf /bitnami/suitecrm/public/legacy/cache/*
echo ""Cache cleared""
''")

Bash(sshpass -p 'Boomershub@123' ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 root@5.161.183.69 "docker exec suitecrm bash -c ''
# Copy JS files to public
cp /opt/bitnami/suitecrm/dist/verbacall-integration.js /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/
cp /opt/bitnami/suitecrm/dist/notification-ws.js /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/
chmod 644 /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/verbacall-integration.js
chmod 644 /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/notification-ws.js
chown daemon:daemon /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/*.js

# Inject into index.html if not already there
if ! grep -q ""verbacall-integration.js"" /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/index.html; then
  sed -i ""s|</body>|<script src=\\""verbacall-integration.js\\""></script></body>|"" /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/index.html
fi
if ! grep -q ""notification-ws.js"" /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/index.html; then
  sed -i ""s|</body>|<script src=\\""notification-ws.js\\""></script></body>|"" /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/index.html
fi

echo ""Done"" && grep -o ""script src=.*js"" /bitnami/suitecrm/public/dist/index.html | tail -5
''")

''")
